title: pulsefire ezreal
body: I just got the Pulsefire ezreal skin. But why i don't get any summoner icon and summoner profile banner. how long will it process?

replies.body: I looked into this for you and I discovered  that you have successfully unlocked the icon.  Keep in mind that you'll need to equip it in order to change the profile banner.  Let me know if that clears things up!
